body_html: Did you try using einsum? I'm not sure we will be introducing such functionality, as it would mean that broadcasting rules would have to be modified in this case, and also we almost always consider the batch dimensions to come first (except in one case)
body_text: Did you try using einsum? I'm not sure we will be introducing such functionality, as it would mean that broadcasting rules would have to be modified in this case, and also we almost always consider the batch dimensions to come first (except in one case)
body: Did you try using `einsum`? I'm not sure we will be introducing such functionality, as it would mean that broadcasting rules would have to be modified in this case, and also we almost always consider the batch dimensions to come first (except in one case)
